    • proxy

      @PostMapping("/proxy/{userId}") @Produces("text/plain") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> proxy(@PathVariable UUID userId, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      Create a unique token for the user and return it.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user id.
      token - The JWT token.
      Returns:
      The unique token.

    • generateUniqueToken

      private String generateUniqueToken(UUID userId)
      Generate a unique token for the user. This token is a hash of the user id and a random string. This token is used to identify the user in the SSE stream.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user id.
      Returns:
      The unique token.

    • streamEvents

      @GetMapping("/subscribe/{uniqueToken}") @Produces("text/event-stream") public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<org.springframework.http.codec.ServerSentEvent<NotificationDTO>> streamEvents(@PathVariable String uniqueToken)
      Stream events to the user.
      Parameters:
      uniqueToken - The unique token of the user.
      Returns:
      A flux of server sent events.

      private reactor.core.publisher.Flux<org.springframework.http.codec.ServerSentEvent<NotificationDTO>> createSseFlux(reactor.core.publisher.Sinks.Many<NotificationDTO> sink, UUID userId, String uniqueToken)
      Create a flux of server sent events from a sink.
      Parameters:

      userId - The user id.
